title: 香港　歐洲議會講座　練乙錚 戴耀廷 主講　梁游 天琦 松泰 松姚

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/HKCPForum/posts/2475374592480693

26/09/2018 星期三。香港時間6pm Facebook Live ！除了練乙錚，戴耀庭等學者主講，大會將播出Videos 。包括被DQ 議員游蕙禎，梁頌恆， Prof Edward Yiu 及被判入獄6 年的梁天琦！


https://www.facebook.com/HongKongWatch1/posts/1818962531557545

26 September 2018 Seminar at the European Parliament Facebook LIVE (Hong Kong Time 6pm/ London Time 11am/ Brussels Time 12:00 noon )

Opening remarks
MEP Prof Joseph Weidenholzer ( Member of European Parliament; Member of Subcommittee on Human Rights) and MEP Jo Leinen

Moderator: Dr Malte Kaeding

Brussels Time:
12:10-12:35 Panel One: Judiciary Independence in Hong Kong
12:35-13:00 Panel Two: Freedom of Speech and Academic research
13:00-13:15 Panel Three: Investment Environment in Hong Kong
13:25-13:50 Discussion
14:00 End

Speakers:
Professor Carol Jones
Professor Benny Yiu Ting Tai
Professor Joseph Yi Zheng Lian
Dr Tim Pringle
Dr Heidi Wang-Kaeding

Via Skype: Nathan Law
+ fieldwork videos : Yau Wai Ching, Baggio Leung, Cheng Chung Tai, Edward Leung, Prof Edward Yiu
